Name:
USS Twiggs
HMS Leamington
Leamington
Zhguchi (Fiery)
Builder: New York Shipbuilding Corporation, Camden, New Jersey
Fate:

Transferred to USSR, 16 July 1944
Returned to United Kingdom, December 1943 or January 1944
Returned to UK, 1950 and scrapped, on 26 July 1951
Notes: Transferred to Canada October 1942; returned to United Kingdom December 1943 or January 1944
Armament:
4 × 4 in (100 mm) guns
2 × 3 in (76 mm) guns
12 × 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
